oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hao, Zhang
Matute Vallejo, Jorge
Casaló Ariño, Luis Vicente
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The image of China as a destination and its market in Spain
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: It is a study reviewing the literature of China and form its tourist destination image, and investigating the determinants and the consequences of the image. With a measurement, put forward a conclusion at the end.
